name: The music that followed
description:
You play as a travelling musician who enters a town in the midst of celebration. However, are things really just as they seem or is something more sinister lurking underneath that cheery exterior? 

A concept demo based on the historical tale of the Pied Piper of Hamelin (which contrary to popular belief, did not actually include any rats!)

This is my first attempt at messing around with Ren'py so please be kind and leave constructive criticism. 

All art including sprites and backgrounds are created by me.

Audio credits:

Seven medieval tunes by Phyllis Chan

Walking on Crunchy Autumn Leaves Sound Effect and Stock Video by Over & Out

Fireplace Free Sound by Shurooq Siddiqui

Festival in the City by Evengard
